typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Flight#} as string,
		Origin as string,
		Dest as string,
		FlightDate as string,
		NoSalesReason as string,
		{TransmittingFlightAttd} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> RIMSource
RIMSource derive(ReasonCol = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> GenerateReason
